metadata.description: Attributed to Jean Siffrein Maury. Cf. Martin & Walter. Also attributed to Thyrel de Boismont. Cf. BN
Includes excerpts from Lettres secrètes sur l'état actuel de la religion. Cf. BN
"Lettre d'Etienne-Charles, archevêque de Toulouse, maintenant de Sens, à Yves-Alexandre, evêque d'Autun"--P. 25-39
"Lettre de Monseigneur Yves-Alexandre, evêque d'Autun, à Monseigneur Etienne-Charles, archevêque de Toulouse"--P. 54-68
metadata.notes: No Copyright found. No Table of Contents found. Damaged, stained pages and cover.
